markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Prediction](/Traits.aspx?ID=132)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 635 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects with this trait determine what is likely to happen in the near future. Most predictions are [divinations](/Traits.aspx?ID=47).
name: Prediction
